attributes.action: Last clap of the year, thanking frontline workers, light a candle of hope 2021.
attributes.additional_details:
Lighting a candle will give humanity a hope of a better and greater 2021. 
Let it shine on 31st night, the last day of 2020., a year that will go down in history as the year that changed the world.
attributes.background: Make it happen on 31st December night at 9pm. We need to start new year with hope and victory for all those who have survived this pandemic as well as remember our loved ones that we have lost.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.
